instructions: Open the Settings app on the iPhone Home screen. Scroll to Passwords & Accounts . Tap Gmail . Turn on the Contacts toggle switch. You may see a message that says Turning on Contacts . When it disappears, syncing is set up.

Open the Settings app on the iPhone. Scroll to Passwords & Accounts . Tap Yahoo . Turn on the Contacts toggle switch. You may be asked to enter the password for your Yahoo account. You may see a message that says Turning on Contacts . With that done, syncing between the two accounts is set up.
